long_description: The boys' REI Sahara shirt offers ample sun protection, ventilation, quick-drying comfort and sharp looks. Durable nylon is soft, breathable, moisture wicking and quick drying for superb comfort and performance. Sahara fabric has a UPF 50+ rating for protection from damaging UV solar rays. Mesh-lined back vent promotes ample air circulation. Features tabs to hold rolled sleeves in place and 2 chest pockets; cord loop on pocket offers a place to store sunglasses or small treasures.
short_description: The boys' REI Sahara shirt offers ample sun protection, ventilation, quick-drying comfort and sharp looks.
